metadata.title: CVE-2020-1737 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Ansible 2.7.17 and prior, 2.8.9 and prior, and 2.9.6and prior when using the Extract-Zip function from the win_unzip module asthe extracted file(s) are not checked if they belong to the destinationfolder. An attacker could take advantage of this flaw by crafting anarchive anywhere in the file system, using a path traversal. This issue isfixed in 2.10.

criterions.comment: ansible: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
